market_news.title: TRAI's Digital Infra Rating for Buildings Sparks Cost Debate
market_news.summary: A conflict is brewing in India between telecom providers and real estate developers over who will bear the costs for a new digital connectivity rating system for buildings. This framework, developed by the Telecom Regulatory Authority, aims to improve indoor mobile and internet signal quality.

market_news.title: Viral Post on High Salaries vs. Home Affordability Sparks Debate
market_news.summary: A viral post on social media platform X, by a user named Akhilesh, has brought India's real estate affordability crisis into focus. The post illustrates how even individuals with high salaries in corporate hubs like Gurugram struggle to afford a home, leading to a nationwide debate.

market_news.title: Japanese Developers Increase Investment in Indian Real Estate
market_news.summary: Japanese real estate investors and developers are making significant, long-term bets on the Indian market. Unlike many others, they are acting as patient, equity-focused investors, primarily targeting land acquisition and early-stage development projects with a long growth horizon.

market_news.title: Indiaâ€™s Real Estate Giants Prepare for a Generational Shift
market_news.summary: Major family-led real estate businesses in India, including the Prestige Group, Brigade Enterprises, and Embassy Group, are in the process of handing over leadership to the next generation of their families.

ai_achievements.title: AI-Powered Enhancements at 100Gaj
ai_achievements.benefits_summary: Our AI tools enhance your property journey by saving you time and effort, helping you make informed, data-driven decisions, providing a personalized experience with tailored recommendations, and improving property visualization with remote virtual tours.
